title: It's Not Home Without You
description: Put a finger down if...-You found the love of your life at 14-You dated them through high school-You had to deal with all the backlash that came with dating the town's golden boy when you were trailer trash girl.-And then one night, you just left.It’s been seven years, and you’ve moved on - or so you thought - then you come home and find your boyfriend in bed with his secretary.You come back to your hometown to start over again to the same place you swore you’d never return.That boy you left behind? He’s all grown up, and he acts like you are nothing.And worst of all, he’s marrying the girl that tried to come between the two of you.But then, a few weeks before he gets married, the truth comes out…
author: C. Lymari
